business development can encompass a

trying to build your business and the
number one piece of advice I give to
startups is don't do it wait as long as
you can build your business as solidly
and as definitively as you can before
you go out and start bringing third
parties in to help you grow simply
because if you don't have your business
in order bringing somebody in to try and

huge distraction so you need to be very
sharing your convictions about where
you're going you need to understand
exactly the things you will do and won't

leading to some great opportunity down

and you go in very skeptically and with

once you find somebody that you know you
think you've got goals aligned with then
I think the next thing you need to make
sure you do is you align your goals and
you get them to make commitments and put
skin in the game very early on if you
don't do that you wind up with the
potential that you'll commit a bunch of

that that partner isn't terribly
invested and I did very early on in my
career a deal with AT&T we were a small
little startup we were about 30 people
we had a remit with them to resell our
product they assigned 18 people to the
project and we looked at that and
thought oh my gosh these guys are
committed they're putting resources into
it and the project dragged on and on and
on and what I eventually came to realize

them
ideally monetary commitments from them
that shows that they're serious because
the thing that you do find after a while
is in most organizations if they're
going to commit resources that can
sometimes be done at a relatively low
level if they're going to commit cash
that generally has to go up to a much
higher level and so the level of
commitment that you gain with cash is
significantly different than the level
of commitment that you're gaining with
just about any other partnership
opportunity so look for alignment look
for commitment look for cash if you're
not able to get those things you
probably should spend your time on other

has been to prove out the business model

they they're not interested in selling

those people are struggling just to
